snippet: The move comes as the government prepares to exit ownership of the lender as early as next year.
abstract: British government extends plan to sell its stake in Lloyds Banking Group for up to six months.
lead_paragraph: The move comes as the government prepares to exit ownership of the lender as early as next year.

headline.main: Britain to Extend Lloyds Share Sale for 6 Months
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Britain Extends Its Lloyds Bank Stake Sale
